title: There is no way that matchmaking in ranked is not rigged. They make you have ~50% win rate.
body: Once you get above 50% they literally find you people that are on the biggest losing streak, or people who have a negative KDA and put them ALL on your team until you get back around 50%. I literally had the same people in my game twice in a row, then in the 2nd game got a bot lane that was like 3-20 with our jungler camping for them instead of snowballing my LeBlanc lol. What a joke.
